msbt.message: So what's the rest of your place like? You're givin' me the grand tour, right?
Hey, are you hidin' somethin' over there behind that furniture? What kinda scam you runnin'? If you got a secret room, I wanna know all about it, kiddo. Gahaha!
This place is, uh, somethin' else I mean, I thought I was messyLook, kiddo. Not to sound like your pops, but you gotta pick up after yourself every so often!

<20_2 arg="10" />OK, I don't understand Why's your <20_2 arg="9" /> facin' the wall?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Ain't it hard to use like that? Or do you know somethin' about usin' your furniture that I don't know?
Hold the phone, kiddo. I don't see a bed, or a dresser, or anything else that makes it look like you live here! If you're a secret agent or somethin' I wanna be the first to know!
Seems like you got things pretty well set up for yourself here, kiddo. Comfy place! Maybe you could come by my place sometime and give me a few tips. Gahaha!

There's somethin' about this place I can't put my finger on itOh! You don't have any decorations up at all! No artwork, no posters, no nothin'! How do you expect to kick up a conversation or anything? You need conversation pieces!
Wow, look at you! You're quite the collector of rare pieces.I used to collect plenty of things myself, but I got tired of movin' 'em around. Watch out for that
Wow, you've got some expensive taste here, kiddo.You some kinda undercover celebrity or somethin'?
Lemme see, how can I say this nicely The place is real clean.<10_4 /> That isthere's nothin' in it at all! It's a bit lonely in here is all I'm sayin'. Maybe spice things up a bit if you can.
Hey, you're really makin' the most outta this space, kiddo!You really got this decoratin' thing figured out, huh? I might just steal your layout for myself, !
It's a real nice place, kiddo. I'm definitely gonna steal a few ideas from you!
The atmosphere in here is real nice, kiddo. It's tasteful and classic, just like you.
Hey, this place is alright! Why didn't you tell me you were a whiz at interior design, eh?
